DOC.criteria: Subject able read voluntarily sign Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve , write informed consent document give opportunity ask question regard study prior performance study specific procedure . Subject require primary unilateral first metatarsal bunionectomy surgery without hammertoe repair collateral procedure allow Subject male female least 18 year age . Subject weigh > = 100 lb ( pound ) . Subject willing able comply protocol able score pain intensity . Subject good health determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) screen laboratory result . Subject develop condition complication result bunionectomy procedure would preclude participation study . Subject willing able remain recovery day care center entire 24hour Treatment period . Subject pregnant lactating . Subject investigational drug within 30 day prior initiation study drug . Subject donate blood blood component within one month prior study ( Checkin ) . Subject know allergy hypersensitivity opioids , acetaminophen , and/or ketorolac . Subject known history substance alcohol abuse within 2 year prior Screening . Subject test positive drug screen ( cocaine , marijuana , opioids , benzodiazepine , barbiturate ) could justify prescription use . Subject condition would contraindicate use opioid analgesia ( e.g. , pulmonary disease paralytic ileus ) . Subject receive selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) , monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOI ) carbamazepine , quinidine , and/or tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) compound within 1month prior Checkin . Subject receive opioids , tranquilizer , sedative , hypnotic within 48 hour prior Checkin . Subject receive corticosteroid , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , analgesic within 24 hour prior Checkin .
